item.title: golang stack
item.description: 实现一个简单的栈: package main import ( "fmt" "testing" ) type Stack []int func (s *Stack) Push(val int) { *s = append(*s, val) } func (s *Stack) Pop() int { if len(*s) == 0 { return -1 } val := (*s)[len(*s)-1] *s = (*s)[:len(*s)-1] return val } func (s *Stack) Peek() int { if len(*s) == 0 { return -1 } return (*s)[len(*s)-1] } func (s *Stack) IsEmpty() bool { return len(*s) == 0 } func TestStack(t *testing.
